SageTVPlugin.Name: Custom Events
SageTVPlugin.Description:
This plugin provides additional events that can be fired within the SageTV core event model system. This plugin also provides passive support for SageAlert meaning that all the events provided by this plugin can also be configured for notification via SageAlert. This version of the plugin provides the following events:
* Recording Space Low: Receive notifications when the free space on your recording drives drops below a configured threshold
Additional events will be added over time. You can also suggest new events on the project web site.
This plugin also provides a complete example of how to create custom events for SageAlert and fire them into SageAlert for processing.
